testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "test01@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd"....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could not login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".....................passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to system.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Select euro currency and verify that products appear with euro symbol
testcase.name: verify Euro Symbol (€) is shown on the 4 products displayed in Home page
testcase.system-out: Given navigate to home page.................................................passed When select euro currency...................................................passed Then all 4 products appear with euro sign...................................passed
